<s>[INST] What are the key nutritional components in the Fruit Nigiri Sushi recipe? [/INST] Sushi rice provides carbohydrates for energy, while coconut milk offers healthy fats and some vitamins and minerals. Watermelon, mango, and peach are rich in vitamins, especially Vitamin C, and various antioxidants. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Raspberry Martini Cocktail? [/INST] The Raspberry Martini Cocktail contains nutritious ingredients such as raspberry puree/juice rich in antioxidants and fiber, lime juice providing vitamin C, and aquafaba from Oggs brand offering protein and fiber. Moose Spirit, made from fermented sources, may contain trace minerals and antioxidants. However, it's important to note that the cocktail's overall nutritional value is limited due to its high sugar content from gomme and alcohol. For a healthier option, consider using fresh raspberries, fresh lime juice, and reducing the gomme amount in the recipe. </s>

<s>[INST] Can you provide information on the nutritional value of the 'Chocolate Baked Pear Pudding' recipe? [/INST] The recipe includes nutritious ingredients like oat flour, cocoa (or carob flour), apple puree, and pear, offering fiber, essential minerals, antioxidants, vitamins, and a balance of nutrients. It minimizes oil and sweeteners to focus on whole grains, fruits, and antioxidants for a wholesome dessert option. </s>

<s>[INST] How does the Breakfast Pizza recipe contribute to reducing its environmental impact? [/INST] The Breakfast Pizza recipe promotes sustainability by using plant-based ingredients like ripe banana and gluten-free oats, which have a lower carbon footprint. Additionally, incorporating seasonal fruits as toppings supports local farmers and reduces food miles, aligning with sustainability goals. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Mediterranean Kale Salad? [/INST] The Mediterranean Kale Salad is a nutritious dish packed with vitamins and minerals. Kale is a nutrient powerhouse rich in vitamins A, C, and K, as well as calcium and potassium. Bell peppers provide vitamin C and antioxidants, chickpeas offer plant-based protein and fiber, and kalamata olives contribute heart-healthy fats. Additionally, cucumbers are hydrating, tomatoes supply lycopene and vitamin C, and the vinaigrette adds heart-healthy olive oil. This well-rounded salad combines various nutritious ingredients to support overall health and well-being. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the BROILED GRAPEFRUIT recipe? [/INST] The BROILED GRAPEFRUIT recipe is a nutritious option rich in vitamin C and fiber from grapefruits, healthy fats from coconut oil, and anti-inflammatory properties from ginger. With moderation of added sugar, this recipe can provide vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants for a balanced meal. </s>

<s>[INST] How does the Buffalo Wings n Waffles recipe contribute to environmental sustainability? [/INST] The Buffalo Wings n Waffles recipe supports sustainability by incorporating plant-based ingredients such as Quorn Buffalo Wings and vegan butter, mayo, and milk. Choosing plant-based options helps reduce the environmental impact associated with traditional meat and dairy production by lowering greenhouse gas emissions, water usage, and land degradation, thus promoting a more sustainable food system. </s>

<s>[INST] What are some of the key nutrients provided by the ingredients in the 'Spaghetti with Sicilian Pesto' recipe? [/INST] The recipe offers various beneficial nutrients such as antioxidants from garlic, vitamin K and iron from fresh basil, healthy fats and protein from almonds, vitamin C and lycopene from cherry tomatoes, and heart-healthy fats and antioxidants from extra virgin olive oil. </s>

<s>[INST] What are the key nutritional benefits of the Santa Fe Black Bean Burger (Vegan) recipe? [/INST] The Santa Fe Black Bean Burger (Vegan) recipe offers a nutritious boost with key ingredients like black beans, oats, flax meal, cumin, and olive oil. These ingredients provide plant-based protein, fiber, omega-3 fatty acids, antioxidants, and healthy monounsaturated fats, offering a good balance of protein, fiber, and healthy fats for a wholesome and satisfying plant-based burger option. </s>

<s>[INST] What environmental benefits does this Simple Vegan Pho recipe offer? [/INST] This recipe promotes sustainability by utilizing plant-based ingredients like tofu, vegetables, and mushrooms, which have a lower environmental impact compared to animal products. By using vegetable broth instead of meat-based broth, the recipe reduces water and land usage associated with meat production. Moreover, incorporating seasonal produce like carrots, snap peas, and cabbage helps reduce the carbon footprint. </s>

<s>[INST] What are the key nutritional components of the Chia Seed Smoothie? [/INST] The Chia Seed Smoothie is a nutritious option due to its key ingredients such as chia seeds packed with fiber, protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and antioxidants, frozen fruits rich in vitamins and minerals, banana offering potassium and fiber, and coconut water or non-dairy milk providing hydration and essential nutrients. </s>

<s>[INST] How do I prepare the Black Bean and Quinoa Burritos recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Black Bean and Quinoa Burritos, first cook quinoa in a pot, sauté onion, bell pepper, tomatoes, zucchini, and corn in a pan, then add black beans, quinoa, and seasoning. Fill tortillas with the mixture, roll them up, freeze for later use, and reheat before serving with avocado and salsa. </s>

<s>[INST] What nutritional value does Instant Pot Quinoa offer? [/INST] Instant Pot Quinoa is a nutritious dish rich in protein, fiber, vitamins, and minerals such as magnesium, iron, and zinc. It contains all nine essential amino acids and provides a balanced combination of macronutrients and essential nutrients for a healthy meal option. </s>

<s>[INST] How can I prepare the Cherry Pie recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Cherry Pie recipe, start by making the pastry by rubbing fat through the flour until it resembles coarse sand. Add sugar and aquafaba, knead the dough, chill it, then roll it out for the pie dish. Pit cherries, cook with sugar and vanilla, fill the pie casing, and bake in the oven until golden brown. </s>

Bibb lettuce

Vegan ‘cheddar’

. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Mediterranean Chopped Salad? [/INST] The Mediterranean Chopped Salad is a nutritious dish packed with essential nutrients. The romaine lettuce provides fiber and vitamins, while the chickpeas offer plant-based protein. Ingredients like cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, and kalamata olives are rich in antioxidants and nutrients essential for a balanced diet. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the 'Fig and Date Smoothie'? [/INST] The 'Fig and Date Smoothie' offers a nutrient-rich combination of ingredients. Figs and dates are excellent sources of fiber, vitamins, and minerals. Bananas are packed with potassium, vitamin C, and B-vitamins. Soy yogurt provides probiotics for gut health and plant-based protein, while pea protein powder further boosts the protein content. This smoothie is a great option for a balanced breakfast or post-workout snack due to its protein and fiber content. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Vegan Quinoa Salad + Zesty Garlic Dressing recipe? [/INST] The recipe is rich in nutrition with quinoa offering plant-based protein and fiber, edamame providing protein and fiber, and chickpeas supplying protein, fiber, iron, and folate. Colorful vegetables and the garlic dressing add various vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, making this a balanced and nutritious meal option. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Easy Oven-Roasted Red Potatoes recipe? [/INST] The Easy Oven-Roasted Red Potatoes recipe offers a nutrient-rich mix, including potassium, vitamin C, and fiber from red potatoes, heart-healthy fats and antioxidants from olive oil, antioxidants from thyme and garlic powder, essential minerals from mineral salt, and vitamins A, K, and C from fresh parsley. </s>

<s>[INST] What environmental benefits does the Whole Roasted Coconut Cauliflower recipe offer? [/INST] The Whole Roasted Coconut Cauliflower recipe promotes sustainability by emphasizing plant-based ingredients that have a lower environmental impact compared to animal products. By using ingredients like cauliflower, potatoes, kale, coconut milk, and spices, you can contribute to a more environmentally-friendly food system and reduce greenhouse gas emissions associated with animal agriculture. </s>

<s>[INST] How can I prepare the Vegan Pumpkin Scones + Maple Glaze recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Vegan Pumpkin Scones + Maple Glaze, you would preheat the oven, mix the dry ingredients, add the wet ingredients, shape the dough, bake the scones, and glaze them once cooled. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the environmental impact of the RAW PAD THAI recipe? [/INST] The RAW PAD THAI recipe has a positive environmental impact by emphasizing plant-based ingredients such as kelp noodles, carrots, zucchini, bell peppers, and more. By choosing these sustainable ingredients, you are reducing the carbon footprint associated with animal agriculture and supporting sustainable agricultural practices. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the environmental impact of the 'Cheesy Vegan Potato Bake' recipe? [/INST] The 'Cheesy Vegan Potato Bake' recipe promotes sustainability by using plant-based ingredients like cashews, almond milk, and vegan cheese, reducing environmental impact compared to dairy. By choosing plant-based alternatives and locally sourced, organic ingredients, this dish helps lower greenhouse gas emissions and supports a more eco-friendly food system. </s>

<s>[INST] How does the choice of vegan butter and locally sourced ingredients in the recipe impact its overall environmental footprint? [/INST] By using vegan butter instead of dairy butter and selecting locally sourced mushrooms and fresh coriander, the Nutty Mushroom and Coriander Pilaf recipe helps reduce its environmental footprint. Vegan butter contributes to a lower carbon footprint compared to dairy butter, while locally sourced ingredients decrease transportation emissions. These conscious choices align with sustainable practices, showcasing how small decisions in ingredient selection can positively impact the environment. </s>

<s>[INST] How does the 'Hot & Sour Pad Thai Salad' promote sustainability and a lower environmental impact through its ingredients? [/INST] The recipe emphasizes sustainability by utilizing plant-based proteins like tofu and vegetables, reducing reliance on high-impact animal products. Ingredients like tofu and veggies help lower greenhouse gas emissions, decrease water usage, and minimize deforestation linked to animal agriculture, contributing to a more sustainable food system. </s>

<s>[INST] How can the nutritional value of the Lemon Tart be enhanced? [/INST] To improve the nutritional value of the Lemon Tart, consider using natural sweeteners or reducing the amount of caster sugar. Additionally, incorporating more nutrient-dense ingredients like fresh fruits or nuts can further enhance the overall nutritional profile of the tart. </s>

<s>[INST] What sustainable elements are incorporated into the 'Sweet and Sour Tofu with Edamame Noodles' recipe? [/INST] The recipe promotes sustainability by utilizing tofu, a plant-based protein with a lower environmental footprint, edamame noodles made from soybeans, and seasonal vegetables to reduce food miles and support local agriculture. Choosing organic and fair-trade ingredients also contributes to a more sustainable food system. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the environmental impact of choosing the Easy Portobello Fajitas recipe? [/INST] The Easy Portobello Fajitas recipe has a positive sustainability impact as it focuses on plant-based ingredients like portobello mushrooms and bell peppers. By omitting meat and incorporating these plant-based foods, the recipe reduces greenhouse gas emissions, water usage, and land degradation associated with meat production. This shift towards more resource-efficient and environmentally friendly ingredients promotes sustainable agriculture practices and supports biodiversity. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare Club Mexicana’s BBQ Pulled Jackfruit? [/INST] To prepare Club Mexicana’s BBQ Pulled Jackfruit, start by frying garlic and jalapeños in oil, then add spices, ketchup, lime, and brown sugar. Stir until the sugar melts. After preparing the sauce, drain and rinse tinned jackfruit, tear the strands from the core, and cook in a pan with mustard and BBQ sauce until crispy. </s>

<s>[INST] What are the nutritional benefits of some specific ingredients in the "Green Bean Salad with Caesar Dressing" recipe? [/INST] Ingredients like cherry tomatoes, carrots, kidney beans, bell peppers, kale/rocket greens, sesame seeds, almonds, and beetroot provide essential vitamins, minerals, fiber, and plant-based protein for a well-rounded and healthy meal option. </s>

<s>[INST] How can I ensure the Banana, Raisin and Walnut Loaf turns out perfectly? [/INST] Follow the preparation instructions carefully, including sifting the dry ingredients, rubbing in the margarine, and adjusting the dairy-free milk based on the banana's ripeness for the ideal consistency. Bake until golden, firm to touch, and a skewer comes out clean. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare the Tofu Scramble recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Tofu Scramble recipe, start by heating oil in a frying pan and sautéing onions and red peppers. Add corn, spring onions, crumbled tofu, fresh coriander, shoyu, and a bit of water. Scramble for 5 minutes, then sprinkle with parsley and black sesame seeds before serving. </s>

<s>[INST] What are the key nutritional components of the Spanish Omelette recipe? [/INST] The Spanish Omelette recipe is rich in nutrients derived from potatoes, chickpea flour, onions, and olive oil. Potatoes offer carbohydrates, fiber, vitamin C, and potassium, while chickpea flour provides protein, fiber, folate, and iron. Onions are a source of antioxidants, and olive oil supplies monounsaturated fats and vitamin E. Combining these ingredients creates a balanced meal with essential nutrients such as carbohydrates, proteins, fiber, vitamins, and minerals. </s>

<s>[INST] What environmental impact does the Buckwheat Pancakes recipe have? [/INST] The Buckwheat Pancakes recipe supports sustainability by incorporating plant-based ingredients with a lower environmental impact. The use of buckwheat flour, unsweetened almond milk, and mashed banana not only provides nutrients but also reduces the carbon footprint compared to traditional ingredients like wheat flour and dairy milk. </s>

<s>[INST] How can I prepare the 'Noodles with Miso-Tahini Sauce' recipe? [/INST] Boil the noodles in 2.5 litres of water, mix miso and tahini in a saucepan, add water gradually, include remaining ingredients, simmer gently, adjust consistency, serve over noodles, and garnish with spring onion and red peppers. </s>

<s>[INST] What are the nutritional benefits of the 'Blackened Roasted Cauliflower ‘Steaks’' recipe? [/INST] The recipe provides a variety of nutrients, with cauliflower offering fiber, vitamins C and K, and antioxidants. Olive oil provides healthy fats and vitamin E, while cherry tomatoes are rich in vitamin C, potassium, and lycopene. Additionally, fresh parsley, lemon wedges, and grains like quinoa or farro contribute to a well-balanced mix of nutrients for a healthy meal option. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Vegan Pumpkin Muffins? [/INST] The Vegan Pumpkin Muffins are a nutritious choice, featuring whole wheat flour for fiber and essential nutrients, vitamin A and fiber from pumpkin puree, and healthier fats from unsweetened applesauce. The plant milk enriches the muffins with vitamins and minerals, and the optional pepitas topping adds healthy fats, protein, and nutrients. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare the Vegan Butter Chicken recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Vegan Butter Chicken recipe, pre-heat your oven to 180°C. Melt the butter in a heavy bottomed pan, add the cloves, cardamom, black pepper, and cinnamon, fry for 1 minute over a medium heat, then add the onions and salt. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Maple Cinnamon Peanut Butter Cookies? [/INST] The Maple Cinnamon Peanut Butter Cookies provide essential nutrients such as fiber from rolled oats, healthy fats from coconut oil, natural sugars for energy from maple syrup, protein from peanut butter, antioxidants and mood-boosting properties from dark chocolate, and anti-inflammatory benefits from cinnamon. However, it is important to consume added sugars and fats in moderation for a balanced diet. </s>

<s>[INST] How do I make the Chia Seed Smoothie? [/INST] To prepare the Chia Seed Smoothie, you simply need to place the frozen fruit, banana, liquids, and chia seeds in the blender cup, attach the lid, and blend to your preferred smoothness. Adjust the liquid content as necessary to achieve the desired consistency. This recipe yields one generous or two small servings. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the environmental impact of using plant-based ingredients in the 'Chocolate Baked Pear Pudding' recipe? [/INST] By using plant-based ingredients like oat flour, apple puree, and pears in this recipe, you're reducing the carbon footprint associated with animal agriculture, supporting sustainable food choices, and lowering environmental impact in terms of resource usage and greenhouse gas emissions. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the Ginger Chilli Tofu Steaks recipe? [/INST] The Ginger Chilli Tofu Steaks recipe contains tofu, a good source of plant-based protein and minerals, red chili providing vitamin C and capsaicin, and ingredients like tamari, orange juice, and zest offering additional nutrients. The inclusion of coconut oil, coconut sugar, and stem ginger also contribute to the balanced nutritional profile of the dish. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the environmental impact of making the Red Pepper Cashew Cream recipe? [/INST] The Red Pepper Cashew Cream recipe promotes sustainability by using plant-based ingredients like cashews, roasted red pepper, and spices. By incorporating this recipe into your diet, you can help reduce your environmental impact by conserving water, lowering greenhouse gas emissions, and supporting biodiversity in the food system. </s>

<s>[INST] How does the 'Roasted Cauliflower, Aubergine and Red Pepper Korma' recipe contribute to the environment? [/INST] The 'Roasted Cauliflower, Aubergine, and Red Pepper Korma' recipe promotes sustainability by utilizing vegan ingredients and vegetables with a lower environmental footprint compared to animal products. Ingredients like cauliflower, aubergine, and red pepper are locally sourced, while using Tideford Organics Vegan Coconut Korma sauce encourages supporting brands that prioritize sustainability, contributing to reduced water usage and land degradation associated with meat production. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I go about preparing the Stuffed Avocados recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Stuffed Avocados recipe, you need to first slice the avocados and remove the seeds. After that, squeeze or rub a little lemon juice on the flesh to prevent browning. Then, mix cucumber, bell pepper, jalapeno, onion, and optional garlic with hummus or vegan mayo in a mixing bowl before filling the avocados and seasoning with salt, pepper, lemon juice, and parsley. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I assemble the RAW PAD THAI recipe? [/INST] To assemble the RAW PAD THAI recipe, place kelp noodles and other vegetables in a large bowl, pour the pad Thai sauce over top, and toss until thoroughly coated. Serve in individual bowls with a squeeze of lime and cashews over the top for a delicious and nutritious meal. </s>

<s>[INST] What environmental impact does the Heirloom Tomato & Endive Salad with Olive Bagna Cauda recipe have? [/INST] This recipe promotes sustainability by using plant-based ingredients like heirloom tomatoes, chickpeas, endive, olives, and capers. These ingredients have a lower environmental impact compared to animal products, and using seasonal, local produce can further reduce the carbon footprint. </s>

<s>[INST] How can I prepare the Crunchy Romaine Salad + Almond-Lime Dressing? [/INST] To prepare the recipe, start by whisking together the almond dressing ingredients until creamy, then let it rest to mingle flavors. Prep your veggies as desired, assemble the romaine salad with the veggies, and drizzle with half of the dressing before enjoying. This recipe serves 2 and leftovers can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 5-6 days. </s>

. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare the Miso Soup recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Miso Soup, soak the Kombu and dried mushrooms in filtered water, then dice the mushrooms and simmer them in the stock with wakame and vegetables. Finally, whisk miso with broth and add to the soup before serving. </s>

<s>[INST] What is the nutritional value of the 'Quick Stir Fry' recipe? [/INST] The 'Quick Stir Fry' recipe is nutritionally rich, offering a variety of vitamins, minerals, and fiber. With ingredients like carrots, peas, bell peppers, and olive oil, the dish provides essential nutrients such as vitamin C, vitamin A, potassium, and heart-healthy monounsaturated fats. </s>

<s>[INST] What environmental benefits are associated with making the 'Lazy Lentils' recipe? [/INST] Making the 'Lazy Lentils' recipe promotes sustainability by using plant-based ingredients like lentils, vegetable stock, onion, garlic, and jalapeño. It reduces water usage, lowers emissions, and supports a more sustainable food system by choosing ingredients with a lower environmental footprint. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare the Fruit and Yogurt Parfait? [/INST] To prepare the Fruit and Yogurt Parfait, chop up all the fruit and start layering it in a tall glass - starting with strawberries, then yogurt, puffed quinoa and kiwi, another layer of yogurt, and finishing with oats and raspberries on top. Let it set in the fridge for an hour. </s>

<s>[INST] What are the key nutritional components of the Vegan Buttermilk Biscuits & Country Gravy recipe? [/INST] The Vegan Buttermilk Biscuits & Country Gravy recipe includes ingredients that offer nutritional value. Unbleached all-purpose flour provides carbohydrates and protein, cashew milk and vegan butter add healthy fats, lemon juice provides vitamin C, vegan sausage offers plant-based protein, and poultry seasoning contains antioxidant-rich herbs. Overall, the recipe provides a balance of macronutrients and essential vitamins and minerals. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare the RAW PAD THAI recipe according to the instructions provided? [/INST] To prepare the RAW PAD THAI recipe, start by combining the sauce ingredients in a bowl and letting it sit for 30 minutes to enhance the flavors. While the sauce is setting, prepare the veggies and rinse the kelp noodles. Then, assemble everything in a bowl, toss with the sauce, and serve with a squeeze of lime and cashews on top. </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare the Roasted Nourish Bowls recipe? [/INST] To prepare the Roasted Nourish Bowls, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Cut and season the vegetables, chickpeas, and lemon before roasting them for 40-45 minutes until they are slightly browned and fork tender. Serve with quinoa, spinach, avocado, hummus, and additional toppings. </s>

<s>[INST] How does the Carrot Banana Bread recipe contribute to sustainability? [/INST] The Carrot Banana Bread recipe promotes sustainability by incorporating plant-based ingredients like spelt flour, bananas, carrots, and walnuts. Choosing plant-based foods reduces the environmental impact associated with animal agriculture, such as greenhouse gas emissions and water usage. </s>

<s>[INST] How do the plant-based ingredients in Vegan Toad in the Hole affect its environmental impact? [/INST] The plant-based ingredients in Vegan Toad in the Hole, such as soy milk, Beyond Sausage, and vegetable stock, have a positive sustainability impact. Soy milk production generally has a lower environmental footprint compared to dairy milk. Beyond Sausage is a plant-based alternative to traditional sausages, reducing reliance on meat production and its associated environmental impacts. Choosing vegetable stock over meat-based broth further diminishes the carbon footprint of the dish. Opting for plant-based ingredients also helps conserve water, decrease greenhouse gas emissions, and promote biodiversity. </s>

<s>[INST] What environmental benefits does the Gooey Pecan Pie recipe offer? [/INST] The recipe promotes sustainability through its plant-based ingredients, reduces greenhouse gas emissions by omitting animal products, supports ethical sourcing with fairtrade sugar, minimizes waste by using whole pecan nuts for decoration, and helps lessen the environmental impact of food production through plant-based meals. </s>

<s>[INST] What environmental benefits does the Vegan Cream Cheese recipe offer? <s>[INST] How should I prepare the Vegan Banana Cake recipe? [/INST] Prep: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Make your flax eggs in a small bowl, let set for at least 10 minutes to thicken while oven in heating, stir occasionally. Lightly grease a 9 x 13 pan with oil. Measure: In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and salt. In a medium bowl, mash the bananas. Measure the milk, oil and vanilla, you can easily combine these in a 2 cup measuring cup. Combine: Add the plant milk, oil, vanilla, and flax eggs to the flour mixture. Mix until just combined. Stir in the mashed bananas. Pour: Once mixed, pour batter into a 9 x 13 baking dish. If needed, spread the batter evenly using a spatula or back of a spoon. Bake: Bake for 45 – 55 minutes. If top starts to brown, top with foil. Cool: Once done, let cool completely. If you’d like to cool it faster, after 30 minutes of cooling on the counter, you can put the dish in the refrigerator to finish cooling. Frosting: While the cake is baking, make the frosting. Add the soaked cashews, maple syrup, coconut cream, lemon juice and pinch of salt to a high speed blender. Blend until creamy smooth. Assemble: Once completely cooled, spread the cashew buttercream frosting over top and enjoy often! Store covered in the refrigerator if you prefer it chilled, or keep it on the counter and serve at room temperature. </s>

<s>[INST] Could you provide a step-by-step guide on how to prepare the 'Quick Stir Fry' recipe? [/INST] Pour some boiling water from the kettle into a pan, put on a low heat and chuck in your edamame beans (these need approx. 5 minutes to cook and should only be on a simmer, never a boil). In a fry pan, add some olive oil and put on a medium heat. Chop up your onion and throw in the pan. Chop/mince your garlic and ginger and add to the pan after a minute or two. Add a good shake or two of cayenne pepper/chili powder and stir well. Add a generous splash or two of soy sauce and mix. Wash your stir fry mix and add to the pan, stir well. Wash your kale, roughly chop and add to the pan. Mix in well so that the kale is combined in with the veggies. Your edamame beans should be ready now, so drain into a colander and set aside briefly. If the kale is starting to wilt and darken in color, open the tofu and chuck into the pan. Mix well. Add the edamame beans and stir in well. Serve and eat without hesitation! </s>

<s>[INST] What are the steps involved in preparing the Raspberry Frozen Yogurt recipe? [/INST] Mix the sugar and agave nectar in the cup of water and stir until dissolved. Add this mixture to a blender (high speed if you have one) with the frozen raspberries. Blend until thoroughly combined. Strain the mixture through a mesh sieve into a large bowl or another vessel that will be easy to pour to remove any crunchy raspberry seeds that may not have been blended. Return about half of the mixture to the blender, add the yogurt, and blend until smooth. Pour back into the bowl with the raspberry puree, add Grand Marnier, and whisk until incorporated. Finally, follow the instructions on your ice cream maker for around 15-20 minutes to churn the mixture into frozen yogurt. Enjoy approximately 1 quart of the delicious Raspberry Frozen Yogurt! </s>

<s>[INST] How should I prepare the Carrot Cake recipe? [/INST] Preheat oven to 180° C, 160° C fan, Gas mark 4. Add lemon juice to soya milk and set aside. Check to see if your cake is cooked by inserting a skewer into the center. If it comes out clean, allow to cool for 5 minutes in the tin before turning out and cooling on a wire tray. <s>[INST] Can you provide an overview of the preparation steps for the Chestnut Cranberry Pie recipe? [/INST] In a large frying pan heat the oil on a medium heat. Once hot, add the onions, cook for 10-15 minutes until translucent. Add the garlic and mushrooms, cook for a further 5-10 minutes until the mushrooms are browned. Add the squash, chestnuts, lentils, water, spinach, cranberries, sage, tomato puree, vermouth, salt, pepper, stock cube and yeast spread to the pan. Simmer for 20-30 minutes until the lentils are soft. Heat your oven to 180c/360f/GM4. Roll the pastry out until it is thin. Cut 8 circles and place in small tart tins making sure the dough goes up the sides. Prick the bases with a fork. Bake for 8-10 minutes until the pastry has cooked and is starting to turn golden brown. Divide the lentil mixture between the tart bases. Cut star shapes from the remaining dough and place on top of each tart. Brush a little milk on the pastry as a glaze. Bake for a further 10 minutes until the filling is cooked through and the star pastry is golden. </s>
